description: This file defines functions and hooks related to user reactions (like, dislike, love, life changing) for videos within the React frontend. It manages local storage persistence of reactions, provides React hooks for accessing and updating reactions, and includes external API integration via a custom useApi hook.

methods.name: getStoredReactions()
methods.description: Reads the reactions map from local storage, returning an object mapping video IDs to reaction types.

methods.name: setStoredReaction(videoId, reaction)
methods.description: Updates the reaction for a specific video in local storage; can add, update, or remove a reaction.

methods.name: useReactions()
methods.description: A React hook that provides the current reactions map, and functions to get and set reactions for videos with optimistic UI updates and optional backend persistence.
